titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable C.W. Bill Young, a Representative from the State of Florida.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/22/2013--Passed House without amendment. Declares that the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable C.W. Bill Young, a Representative from Florida. Declares that when the House adjourns on October 22, 2013, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of the deceased Representative.
